meanings.definition: Talmudisms: sayings or teachings from the Talmud
meanings.sent1: The rabbi shared some interesting talmudisms during the lesson.
meanings.sent2: Scholars often study ancient talmudisms to understand Jewish traditions better.
meanings.sent3: When the student tried to impress his friends with talmudisms, they all laughed.
meanings.sent4: Her wisdom was like a treasure trove of talmudisms, guiding those around her.
meanings.sent5: The talmudisms echoed through the synagogue, filling the air with ancient wisdom.
